result.reason: Issue #1327 titled 'keyboard vnc issue' lacks specifics — no description of which keys fail, OS/server combination, or reproduction steps; the codebase already has a VncLockKeyFilter addressing lock-key problems (Caps Lock, Num Lock) and Cyrillic keysym mapping, so without knowing which keyboard behavior is broken it is impossible to determine if this is already fixed or a new gap.
result.approach: Request reporter to describe: which key(s) misbehave, host OS, VNC server type/version, and whether the issue persists with the latest build; then check VncLockKeyFilter PreFilterMessage logic against the reported key
